movie.title: My Life Without Me
movie.description_intro: Ann, 23 years old, lives a modest life with her two kids and her husband in a trailer in her mother's garden. Her life takes a dramatic turn, when her doctor tells her that she has uterine cancer and only two months to live. She compiles a list of things to do before she dies.
movie.description_full: Ann, 23 years old, lives a modest life with her two kids and her husband in a trailer in her mother's garden. Her life takes a dramatic turn, when her doctor tells her that she has uterine cancer and only two months to live. She compiles a list of things to do before she dies.

movies.title: The Sasquatch Gang
movies.summary: Young fantasy and science fiction aficionado Gavin Gore and his friends stumble onto some huge footprints in the woods. A local cop, reporter, and a renowned Sasquatch authority investigate, while two of Gavin's dim-witted neighbors hatch a scheme to profit from the situation.

A local cop, reporter, and a renowned Sasquatch authority investigate, while two of Gavin's dim-witted neighbors hatch a scheme to profit from the situation.

movies.title: Dark Figure of Crime
movies.summary: A criminal thriller about the fierce psychological confrontation between a detective and a killer who confessed to multiple murders.
movies.description_full: A criminal thriller about the fierce psychological confrontation between a detective and a killer who confessed to multiple murders.
movies.synopsis: A criminal thriller about the fierce psychological confrontation between a detective and a killer who confessed to multiple murders.

movies.title: That Obscure Object of Desire
movies.summary: Just after boarding a train, much to the surprise of his fellow passengers, a man pours a bucket of water over a young girl on the platform. Over the next few hours he explains (and we see in flashback) how he became obsessed by her (so much so that he failed to notice that she was played by two different actresses, representing different sides of her personality), and how she tantalised him, but would never allow him to satisfy his desire for her...

movies.title: Buffalo Boys
movies.summary: Two brothers named Jamar and Suwo came back to the land of Java to avenge their father, who was a Sultan, after years of exile in America.
